passages.text:
Jasper,twisted::This is it, the room at the end of the wing - where Wiggly was supposed to meet us.

Julia,worried::Miss?  Miss!

Jasper,looking_forward::Julia is behind us.  She followed us all the way down the hall.

Julia,concerned::Miss, slow down!  You're medicated, you shouldn't be walking without assistance!

[[Continue->Not Alright]]
passages.name: Untitled Passage

passages.text:
Jasper,looking_forward::Do not stop, do not wait for her.  Where is Wiggly?  Try to find Wiggly.  He should be here.  You are not alright.

[[Why am I having these visions?]]
[[Am I standing right?  My head is pointed in the sky direction, yeah?]]
[[p:(Action) Find something to grab and regain balance.]]

links.name: Why am I having these visions?
links.link: Why am I having these visions?

links.name: Am I standing right?  My head is pointed in the sky direction, yeah?
links.link: Am I standing right?  My head is pointed in the sky direction, yeah?

links.name: p:(Action) Find something to grab and regain balance.
links.link: p:(Action) Find something to grab and regain balance.

passages.name: Not Alright

passages.text:
You flail your hands wildly, groping haphazardly for an anchor.  Your right hand lands first, finding a handle on the nearby medical cabinet.

The cabinet is your only source of stability.  You put all your weight on it, trying to balance.

It's not as heavy as you imagined.  You can feel it tipping towards you.  There's no stopping it.

[[p:(Action) Dodge out of the way.]]

links.name: p:(Action) Dodge out of the way.
links.link: p:(Action) Dodge out of the way.

passages.name: p:(Action) Find something to grab and regain balance.

passages.text:
You flail forwards towards the back of the room, mostly clear of the falling cabinet, but your legs end up pinned underneath.  

A mutlicolored assortment of vials, syringes, and ampoules flow forth from the cabinet.  They stain the floor you're pinned to.

Not a moment later, you hear clanging footsteps.  Julia is closing the distance.  

[[Continue->Restraint]]
passages.name: p:(Action) Dodge out of the way.

passages.text:
Julia enters the room, jams her knee between your shoulderblades, and arrests your left wrist, pulling it behind your back.  Her skin feels like ice.  

The distortions intensify the moment her skin touches yours.  

She's restraining you, and she's poisoning you.

[[p:Hey!  Let me go!]]
[[p:Julia, what are you doing?!?->p:Hey!  Let me go!]]
passages.name: Restraint

passages.text:
Julia,suspicious::The patient is behaving violently, initiating restrainment procedures.

Julia is shouting down the hall.  She pretends not to hear you.

You struggle, but Julia has a stranglehold on your left wrist, and her knee on your back.  

Your legs remain pinned by the medical cabinet, though you can tell it isn't too heavy.  

Jasper,looking_forward::Your right hand is free!  Use it!

[[(Action) Grab a syringe-tipped ampoule and stab Julia.]]
[[(Action) Look at the needle.]]
[[1;:I thought you weren't supposed to share needles.]]
[[1;p:(Action) Stab yourself with the hypodermic needle.]]

links.name: (Action) Grab a syringe-tipped ampoule and stab Julia.
links.link: (Action) Grab a syringe-tipped ampoule and stab Julia.

links.name: 1;:I thought you weren't supposed to share needles.
links.link: 1;:I thought you weren't supposed to share needles.

links.name: 1;p:(Action) Stab yourself with the hypodermic needle.
links.link: 1;p:(Action) Stab yourself with the hypodermic needle.

passages.name: p:Hey!  Let me go!

passages.text:
You seize the needle and violently strike Julia's right thigh.  You penetrate her envelope, breaking her epidermis.

An electric shock shivers down your spine.  You shake off the intrusions.

Julia doesn't react to the invasion.  She isn't even trying to prevent a second strike.  She finds it familiar.

The room begins to reek of organic solvents.  Your shoulder blades and left wrist start to burn.

[[Continue->p:Hey!  Let me go!]]
passages.name: (Action) Grab a syringe-tipped ampoule and stab Julia.

passages.text:
You drag the vial into your field of view.  You can make out the label now.  The needle contains a dose of norepinephrine.

Jasper,surprised::Inject it!  Straight into the mainline.  This should still be intuitive for you.

Jasper::Use the boost to wrestle out of Julia's grip.

[[Continue->p:Hey!  Let me go!]]
passages.name: (Action) Look at the needle.

passages.text:
You haphazardly plunge the needle into the outer side of your right thigh, midway between your hip and knee.  The sting of violent self-penetration reverberates through your leg.

Julia,concerned::...Aaahg!...

Julia releases her grip and throws herself back.  You failed to navigate the norepinephrine to a viable vein, but stabbing yourself has thrown Julia off balance.  

[[p:(Action) Free yourself.]]
passages.name: 1;p:(Action) Stab yourself with the hypodermic needle.

passages.text:
Jasper,surprised::Rot takes 40 years to kill you these days!  Just do it!

[[Continue->p:Hey!  Let me go!]]
passages.name: 1;:I thought you weren't supposed to share needles.

passages.text:
Jasper,looking_forward::Get up!  We need to make a run for it!

You pull your legs out from under the cabinet, and coil yourself into a pouncing position.

You notice your left hand is covered in blood.

[[p:(Action) Stand up, turn around, and run for it.]]

links.name: p:(Action) Stand up, turn around, and run for it.
links.link: p:(Action) Stand up, turn around, and run for it.

passages.name: p:(Action) Free yourself.

passages.text:
You press your chest up and tuck in your knees, quickly but deliberately putting your weight on your right foot.  You begin to push your center of mass up.

[[Continue->Standing]]
passages.name: p:(Action) Stand up, turn around, and run for it.

passages.text:
Your balance fades slightly as your right leg nears full extension.  You slam your left leg firmly into the liquid floor, stabilizing yourself.

Both legs are fully extended now.  

Jasper,twisted::You're doing it.  You're standing.

[[p:Turn around.]]
passages.name: Standing

passages.text:
Julia has retreated to the corner, hyperventilating.  

[[C->Shut door]]
passages.name: p:Turn around.

passages.text:
You still haven't fully regained the capacity to coordinate your muscles.  You ramble through the door, clumsily but successfully.

Fuck, which way do you go?  Left or right?

[[p:Left.]]
[[p:Right.]]
passages.name: p:(Action) Run out the door.

passages.text:
Yeah, right has been going well for us lately.  Had to use your right arm for stabbing, grabbing, and all that.  And by god it got the job done.

Now, run, no, ramble down the hallway!

[[p:(Action) Ramble down the hallway.->Ramble]]
passages.name: p:Right.

passages.text:
You've made it into the Foyer.  You hear footsteps following you.  Look for a place to hide!

[[(Action) Look Left.]]
[[(Action) Look Down.]]
[[(Action) Look Right.]]
[[2,p:(Action) Follow Wigley into the tunnels.]]
passages.name: Nearly There

passages.text:
On the right, you see-

Hey, look.  That's Wigley!

Wigley::This way.

Wisely, he speaks in a subdued tone.  He must know someone is after you.
passages.name: (Action) Look Right.

passages.text:
You propel yourself to the tunnel entrance, and ungangly, yet awe inspiring and majestic sight.

[[Continue->Looking Down Hatch]]
passages.name: 2,p:(Action) Follow Wigley into the tunnels.

passages.text:
As you approach the hatch Wigley begins descending the ladder.  Follow his lead.

[[p:(Action) Descend.]]
passages.name: Looking Down Hatch

passages.text:
Getting your right foot onto the top rung goes smoothly enough, but getting the left on proves tricky.  You miss the next rung, and feel your foot unexpectedly hit the one beneath.  You lose grip and fall back.

[[Continue->Fall]]
passages.name: p:(Action) Descend.

passages.text:
You fall about six feet, onto your back.  You bring Wigley down with you.  You lay back, staring up at the open hatch.

[[Wiggly, close the hatch.]]
passages.name: Fall

passages.text:
Wiggly shakes himself out of his shock, then processes your command.  He seems to understand.  He collects himself and hurries to the top of the ladder.  You can sense light footsteps inducing vibrations in the dust above, causing minute amounts of insulation to fall onto your face.

Wiggly makes it to the top of the ladder and closes the latch, locking it as he does so.
passages.name: Wiggly, close the hatch.

passages.text:
The door is locked now.  You violently shake the handle.  It's as if the door is glued into its frame.

Jasper,thinking::It's just like the isolation cell door that separated you from Wiggly.

Jasper,sad::The Cradle wants us here.

You feel an icy tug on your right leg.

[[C->Look down]]
passages.name: p:(Action) Open the door.

passages.text:
Julia is huddled in the corner, whimpering.  Her body is lightly convulsing, as if she were being electrocuted.

Jasper,twisted::She is pathetic.

[[p:What did you inject me with?  Why did you pin me to the ground?]]
[[p:(Action) Kick Julia.]]

links.name: p:What did you inject me with?  Why did you pin me to the ground?
links.link: p:What did you inject me with?  Why did you pin me to the ground?

passages.name: p:(Action) Confront Julia.

passages.text:
Julia doesn't respond.  Instead, she scurries forward and tightly grips your calf.

[[C->Julia looks up]]
passages.name: p:What did you inject me with?  Why did you pin me to the ground?

passages.text:
You swing your right leg into Julia, but she intercepts the blow.  

She latches onto your leg.  Her fingers delve through your cloth, into your skin.

[[C->Julia looks up]]
passages.name: p:(Action) Kick Julia.

passages.text:
Julia::Help me out of this.  Give me the sedatives, Miss.  You should be so grateful I gave them to you.

Julia::Please, Miss, I am in pain.  You don't know what this feels like.

[[p:(Action) Try to tug away.]]
[[p:(Action) Strike Julia.]]
passages.name: Julia looks up

passages.text:
Julia::Miss, no, please don't leave me like this.  Please not here, not in this room!

Julia::Leave me alone, anywhere else!

Her fingers sink deeper.  Your calf begins to sear.

[[p:(Action) Try to break free.]]
[[p:(Action) Kiss Julia.]]
passages.name: p:(Action) Try to tug away.

passages.text:
Her contorted body is like a bag of ice.  Every blow is absorbed and ignored.

Julia::Please, Miss, just help me.  Help me out of it.

Her fingers sink deeper.  Your calf begins to sear.

[[p:(Action) Try to break free.]]
[[p:(Action) Kiss Julia.]]
passages.name: p:(Action) Strike Julia.

passages.text:
You violently kick julia to the ground.  She again begins to shake

[[C->Hands]]
passages.name: p:(Action) Try to break free.

passages.text:
You cave to the intrusions.  You bend down and press your lips against Julia's.  You move your right hand down her chest.

You feel a pleasant shock, ringing through your jaw.

For a moment, the contact feels radiant, and beautiful.

But the radiance soon gives way to heat.  Burning, painful heat.

Your lips inflame.  Bullet ants begin swarming your body.

[[C->p:(Action) Try to break free.]]
passages.name: p:(Action) Kiss Julia.

passages.text:
She stares down at her hands.

Julia::Why?  Why do I still see these?

Your own hands begin to burn.  Violently.

The sensation spreads.  Bullet ants begin swarming your body.

Your legs are invaded.  They begin to fail and revolt.

[[C->Recoil]]
passages.name: Hands

passages.text:
You fall to the ground, paralyzed.

The ceiling is trying to suck you in.  It's succeeding.

Your legs and arms extend and retract, taking on bizarre proportions.  

You feel like a severed toe.

Jasper,thinking::Why do I keep finding you like this?

[[p:(Action) Soak in the sights and just vibe.]]
[[p:(Action) Fight to regain composure.]]

links.name: p:(Action) Soak in the sights and just vibe.
links.link: p:(Action) Soak in the sights and just vibe.

passages.name: Recoil

passages.text:
Jasper,head_tilted::This maneuver has never, ever worked for you in the past.

Jasper::Just look at the situation.

Jasper,thinking::The sights are horrific and the vibes are rancid.  This isn't going well.

[[C->Noise]]
passages.name: p:(Action) Soak in the sights and just vibe.

passages.text:
Jasper,twisted::Yes, gaslight yourself.  Your legs and arms ARE the same length.  Proprioceptive senses lie.

Jasper,thinking::The ceiling is just a normal ceiling, adorned with a cool pattern.  You can just see it more clearly now.

Jasper,head_tilted::The nerve endings fraying along your appendages are merely toxins leaving the body.  You will come out of this healthy.

[[C->Noise]]
passages.name: p:(Action) Fight to regain composure.

passages.text:
The fog is interrupted by an intrusive, grating sound - the sound of a hatch opening.

[[C->Wiggly Arrives]]
passages.name: Noise

passages.text:
Wiggly::Miss?  Miss!?!

Jasper,surprised::He's opened the grate leading to the ducts for you.  

Jasper::Dive for it!

[[p:(Action) Dive into the aperture.]]
passages.name: Wiggly Arrives

passages.text:
You hurl yourself into a horrible configuration some would call "upright."

[[C->fadeout]]
passages.name: p:(Action) Dive into the aperture.

passages.text:
You launch yourself into the hole.

...
passages.name: fadeout

passages.text:
You look down.  Julia is tugging at you.

Her body is lightly convulsing, as if she were being electrocuted.

Jasper,twisted::She is pathetic!

[[p:What did you inject me with?  Why did you pin me to the ground?]]
[[p:(Action) Kick Julia.]]

links.name: p:What did you inject me with?  Why did you pin me to the ground?
links.link: p:What did you inject me with?  Why did you pin me to the ground?

passages.name: Look down

passages.text:
Jasper,thinking::She shut the door when she entered.  Will it open?

[[p:(Action) Open the door.]]
[[p:(Action) Confront Julia.]]
passages.name: Shut door

passages.text:
Jasper,thinking::The energy meant to feed your eyes, meant to keep them running, has been sucked into your jaw.  

Jasper,head_tilted::The tension in your teeth is terrible, and a metallic tinge is blistering your tongue.

Jasper::Your eyes are running at half capacity.  The results are Hildegardian.

[[C->Not Alright]]
passages.name: Why am I having these visions?

passages.text:
Jasper,head_tilted::Close enough, but that's changing fast.  Our proprioceptive competencies are a fucking shambles.  

Jasper,looking_forward::We're losing balance, quickly.  Find something to grab onto!

[[C->Not Alright]]
passages.name: Am I standing right?  My head is pointed in the sky direction, yeah?
